peoples.name: پدرام مرندی
peoples.subject: What is Graphql and how to implement a scalable GraphQL project with React & Apollo?
peoples.bio: full-stack Javascript web developer and a full-time Software Engineering student.developer at Ezerus.com, and we make enterprise Javascript applications with React, powered by lovely GraphQL, Apollo and Prisma.

peoples.name: آنا لوا
peoples.subject: An Introduction to Real-Time programming in Javascript
peoples.bio: having +4 years of experience in backend development utilizing various technologies and concepts such as Nodejs, mongodb, Elasticsearch, Microservices Architecture, Docker and etc.

peoples.name: سجاد بیرقدار
peoples.subject: React Native Architecture
peoples.bio: How React Native works, What issues it has and how they will be addressed in the React Native new architecture.

peoples.name: جرمی وبستر
peoples.subject: How Not to Be Innovative
peoples.bio: The talk will be about where Innovation in technology comes from, based on my own research and experience, and how your choice of technologies in a project can stop innovation

peoples.name: جرمی وبستر
peoples.subject: Everything You Need To Know About SVG
peoples.bio: why SVG is such an important part of building websites. From why SVG is useful and how to get your hands on it all the way to implementing it as a system and fancy stuff like animating it.

peoples.name: مجتبی اسبری پور
peoples.subject: React 16 Overview
peoples.bio: An overview on how React works and what features are added to it in version 16.x

peoples.name: میلاد حیدری
peoples.subject: hiring issues in Front-End Community
peoples.bio: Developers looking for good companies and companies looking for good developers. We have issues regarding this matter, milad wants to go deep and talk about encounter between knowledge and companies.

peoples.name: میلاد حیدری
peoples.subject: React Server-Side Rendering
peoples.bio: render on the server rather than in the browser. talk about Cons of Rendering React on the Server, Architecture, Performance and challenges.

peoples.name: احسان محمدی
peoples.subject: Why are we using React.js in our project?
peoples.bio: Advanced Efficiency, Reusability of React Components,Performance,Modularity and the market job, ... and everything is Javascript.

peoples.name: حامد اسماعیلی
peoples.subject: How Diffing Algorithm Works In React
peoples.bio: Manipulating the DOM‌ is an intensive operation in the browser world, react uses VDOM concept to do that with its own diffing algorithm to improve performance which we aim to go through it to understand what is under the hood.

peoples.name: سمانه محمدی
peoples.subject: Styled-Component Architecture
peoples.bio: how to make Dynamic interactive user interface based on components and how to use it for building complex interfaces.

peoples.name: محمد جهانی
peoples.subject: useHooks!
peoples.bio: Hooks are the new/hot feature of React 16.8. The talk is going to cover everything you need to know about Hooks and provide some answers to the questions like "What are Hooks?", "Why we should use them?", and "How to use them?"

peoples.name: محمد حسین ملک
peoples.subject: PWA in React!
peoples.bio: he have more than six years of hands-on experience efficiently developing websites and Web-Applications using Modern Javascript frameworks like React and VueJs. he had the opportunity to be a part of many cool and innovative teams and companies. For now, we just want to talk about how we can develop a great PWA. starts with a simple introduction to PWA and how it is and what issues you might have on this journey and etc.

peoples.name: احمد کریم پور
peoples.subject: A Cup of React-Native
peoples.bio: Understanding the communication between JS & Native, Error Tracking, Codepush, VirtualizedList...

peoples.name: طاهره غلامی
peoples.subject: State management with React Context API
peoples.bio: Tahere has been developing Frontend applications for 6+ years including more than two years on React/Redux.React Context API is a powerful feature, you might consider using it when your React Application grows in size and depth froma component perspective.

peoples.name: نگار جمالی فرد
peoples.subject: How to deal with CORS error in Webpack?
peoples.bio: Does CORS error haunts you in every project? Are you tired of asking backend team to handle it? This talk is going to give you all the power to handle this error in development.

team.bio: Founder of Reactconf & Hastnama Creative Solutions
